trans-unit.source: Describes how abstract content is mapped into a concrete format.
trans-unit.target: Descreve como o conteúdo abstrato é mapeado para um formato concreto.

trans-unit.source: This abstract class forms the base class for the following classes:
trans-unit.target: Essa classe abstrata formulários a classe base para as classes a seguir:

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates a typical use of the `MessageBinding` class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra um uso típico de `MessageBinding` classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" /> of which the current <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding" /> is a member.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" /> do qual o <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding" /> atual é um membro.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" /> of which the current <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding" /> is a member.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" /> deles atual <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding" /> é um membro.

trans-unit.source: Each of the classes derived from the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding> class corresponds to a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) element (`<input>`, `<output>` or `<fault>`) enclosed by the `<operation>` element, which is in turn enclosed by the `<binding>` element.
trans-unit.target: Cada uma das classes derivadas do <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding> classe corresponde a um elemento WSDL Web Services Description Language () (`<input>`, `<output>` ou `<fault>`) entre o `<operation>` elemento, que por sua vez colocado entre o `<binding>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding> class corresponds to that `<operation>` element in the WSDL document.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding> classe corresponde àquela `<operation>` elemento no documento WSDL.

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre WSDL, consulte a especificação em http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
